name: Cactorio!
description:
After accidentally burning down the Cactus Dimension because he left the stove on, Pablo the Cactus Farmer is forced to move into a new world to rebuild his empire with nothing but a cool hat and an affinity for prickly plants.

In Cactorio, the long-awaited sequel to the hit game Cactus Farmer, you can farm, build, explore, and fight your way to become the universe's greatest cacti tycoon. After collecting enough cactus seeds, you can automate farming using Cactech, which was developed by Pablo after receiving a master's degree in agricultural engineering. But watch out, desert savages are always combing the desert and are ready to destroy everything you've worked for, so be prepared!

This game is a submission to Ludum Dare 45. Submission page can be found here.
